availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William L. Auxier (Johnson County, Kentucky, student & farmer)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, student and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Auxier and Agnes Wells Auxier. Student in Johnson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Student in Johnson County in 1860. Farmer in Johnson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 123A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 173.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, Prestonsburg, p. 615B.
